sentence.Network_en: I vanquished her coldness with my assiduity.
sentence.Network_cn: 我对她关心照顾从而消除了她的冷淡.

sentence.Network_en: He observed that no virtue was able to resist his arts and assiduity.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说,什么道德都抵制不了他的手段和殷勤.

sentence.Network_en: Knowlege is gained from assiduity , unwisdom is resulted from sluttery!
sentence.Network_cn: 知识是从刻苦中得来, 无知是从懒惰中美成!

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Latin assiduitas, from assiduus 'occupied with' (see assiduous)

means.word_mean: 1. great and constant diligence and attention
